record.field: Sale Subscription: Automation Payment when come period
Sale Subscription: Send Email Dunning Payment
Sale Subscription: change status trial expired

table.style: box-sizing:border-box;padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear Marc Demo,
Welcome onboard to HiiBoss and congratulations on your new subscription. You can get started with it right away and we hope you will enjoy our services.
Please activate your active subscription by clicking the button below:
Click to activate your instance
If you have questions about this activation, your subscription, or would just like to chat, contact us at any time. We'd love to hear from you. View our Online Support for more information too.
You can also sign in to the Customer Portal to manage your account and view your transactions and payments.
Thank you,
HiiBoss Pte Ltd

table.style: box-sizing:border-box;min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:collapse;

record.field: HIIBOSS SUBSCRIPTION - Reminder To Set Payment

table.style: box-sizing:border-box;padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear Marc Demo,
You need to update your sales subscription payment card information with code SUB123
You can also sign in to the Customer Portal to manage your account and view your transactions and payments.
Thank you,
HiiBoss Pte Ltd

table.style: box-sizing:border-box;min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:collapse;

record.field: Your subscription is now activated and we are creating your HiiBoss system!

table.style: box-sizing:border-box;padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear Marc Demo,
We're writing to let you know that your subscription has been activated. Additionally, we are creating your HiiBoss system and it may take up to 5 minutes to do so. We will notify you again once your HiiBoss system is ready for use. Your HiiBoss system is accessible at
abc.com
If you have questions about this activation, your subscription, or would just like to chat, contact us at any time. We'd love to hear from you. View our Online Support for more information too.
You can also sign in to the Customer Portal to manage your account and view your transactions and payments.
Thank you,
HiiBoss Pte Ltd

table.style: box-sizing:border-box;min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:collapse;

record.field: {{ object.company_id.name }}: Your instance has been deleted!

table.style: box-sizing:border-box;padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Over the last few weeks, we have sent you reminders about your non active account and requesting your immediate attention to it.
Since your account was inactive, it has been permanently deleted, in line with HiiBosss data retention policy.
Note: If you have other active accounts with HiiBoss, they will remain unaffected.
Thank you

table.style: box-sizing:border-box;min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:collapse;
box-sizing:border-box;padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear Marc Demo,
Thank you for choosing HiiBoss to manage your business.
Our systems have been designed to delete non active accounts automatically, as per HiiBosss data retention policy.
To prevent the automatic deletion of your non active account, please notify us immediately.
Important: If there is no reply from you for the incoming days, your non active account, along with its data will be deleted permanently within the next 30 days.
If you need assistance here, please notify us immediately. We are here to help you.
You can also sign in to the Customer Portal to manage your account and view your transactions and payments.
Thank you,
HiiBoss Pte Ltd

table.style: box-sizing:border-box;min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:collapse;
